techmeme.title: Sources: Thoma Bravo-backed enterprise security software company SailPoint raised $1.38B in an upsized IPO at $23 per share, giving it a $12.8B market cap (Bailey Lipschultz/Bloomberg)
NYC- and Bengaluru-based SpotDraft, which offers tools to help in-house legal teams simplify contracting tasks, raised a $54M Series B led by Vertex and Trident (Kyle Wiggers/TechCrunch)
On its Q4 earnings call, AppLovin said it signed a $900M deal, including $500M in cash, to divest its portfolio of 10 game studios, as it shifts to pure ad tech (Neil Long/Mobilegamer.biz)
Filing: OpenAI says Elon Musk's $97.4B bid contradicts his attacks in his lawsuit against OpenAI that its assets can't be "transferred away" for "private gain" (Malathi Nayak/Bloomberg)
OpenAI plans to give free ChatGPT users unlimited GPT-5 access at "the standard intelligence setting"; Plus and Pro users will get to run GPT-5 at higher levels (Igor Bonifacic/Engadget)
